caption.p: Schematic representation of the Structural-Activity-Relationship (SAR) of the steroid-alkaloid class of phytoconstituents; conarrhimine, conessimine, conessine, conimine and isoconnessine, isolated from H. pubescens. IC 50 expressed in ÂµM, range of 4 to >300 for acetylcholinesterase (AChE)/neuroprotective activity.
